definitions.definition: Distinguished by a unique , particular , or unusual quality.
examples: a special episode of a television series
Why are you standing up in your seat? What are you, special ?

definitions.definition: Of particular value or interest; dear ; beloved .
examples: his special friend of many years, Bill

definitions.definition: Of or related to unconventional warfare .
Appointed specifically to examine a single event or issue.
Constituting or relating to a species .
examples: Having seven dark spots is a special property unique to Coccinella septempunctata .

definitions.definition: Of or related to disabilities , especially learning or intellectual disabilities .
examples: He goes to a special school.
What do you mean, you don't understand the sign?  What are you, special ?
subdefinitions.label_groups: by extension , derogatory , often offensive , comparable

subdefinitions.definition: Of, being, or pertaining to sexual intercourse or the genitals .
examples: The parents told the kids not to bother them during special time.
The girl said the man had tried to touch her special place.

subdefinitions.definition: Infused with a drug , especially marijuana ; that is an edible .

main_definition: Distinguished by a unique , particular , or unusual quality.
secondary_definitions: Of particular value or interest; dear ; beloved .
( military ) Of or related to unconventional warfare .
( law ) Appointed specifically to examine a single event or issue.
Constituting or relating to a species .
( euphemistic , not comparable ) Of or related to disabilities , especially learning or intellectual disabilities .
